text:
I keep getting this exception no matter what JSP I try to access: org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSP C:\jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1\work\localhost\is5\testJSP$jsp.java:77: Incompatible type for method. Explicit cast needed to convert java.lang.Throwable to java.lang.Exception. if (pageContext != null) pageContext.handlePageException(t); ^ 1 error at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484) JSP file: Testing JSP <% String s = "Test string"; if(request.getParameter("textVal") != null) s = request.getParameter("textVal"); %>

Testing JSP in Tomcat 4.0.1

Value of variable s: 

Installation: Tomcat 4.0.1 binary on W2000 Context path (under which I try to get JSP working) is outside tomcat folder (if that matters)
